title: Chintz Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 3 reds applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
description: Fragment of a repeating pattern with flowers, rococo scrolls and animals. Fragment has been cut as for a valance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragment, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 3 reds applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-54.
